CustomField.description:
Calculates and displays the length in days that the current owner of this case has owned it in days.
Pre 7/7/10, formula was reporting number of hours. Change per Case #04483753.
OLD DESCRIPTION - Calculates and displays the length in hours that the current owner of this case has owned it in hours
CustomField.formula:
If(ISNULL(ClosedDate),
(today() - datevalue(Current_Owner_Start_Date_Time__c) - 2*( floor((today() - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((datevalue(Current_Owner_Start_Date_Time__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))),
(datevalue(ClosedDate) - datevalue(Current_Owner_Start_Date_Time__c) - 2*( floor((datevalue(ClosedDate) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((datevalue(Current_Owner_Start_Date_Time__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculates and displays the length in days that the current owner of this case has owned it in days.
CustomField.label: Current Owner Duration
